entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
